mdRecord.dcterms:title: Diagram of the surveying district, south of Tennessee / Surveyors Office, Octr. 1st. 1841 Jackson, Mississippi, B.A. Sudlow, Surveyor South of Tennessee
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sudlow, B. A. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map covers most of the state of Mississippi. [original]
"27th Congress, 2nd. session. S. Doc. No." -- Upper left corner. [original]

Also shows: Choctaw boundary of 1822; Choctaw cession of 1830; Choctaw District; old Choctaw boundary; boundary line between the Choctaw and Chickasaw cessions; districts east and west of Pearl River. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Indians of North America--Mississippi--Maps
